title: Portfolio | IN-FOMO
subtitle: Explore our projects and learn how we've helped businesses achieve their goals
meta_description: Explore our portfolio of innovative IT solutions and successful projects across various industries.
hero_description: Discover our successful projects and innovative solutions that have helped businesses transform and grow.
project_polerowanie_description: Complete website redesign with modern features and improved content, focusing on user experience and conversion optimization.
project_blastlybot_title: Service Interface with AI and Telegram Bot
project_blastlybot_description: Developed an intuitive client interface for easy access to information via AI and Telegram bots, enhancing customer support and interaction.
project_pharmprostir_description: Fast and well-designed e-commerce site that significantly increased sales through improved user experience and optimized checkout process.
project_cryptorecovery_description: Using cutting-edge technology and deep blockchain expertise, we help recover your lost crypto assets with maximum efficiency.
project_savier_description: Developed a specialized blog about tactical medicine with a modern design and user-friendly navigation, providing valuable information in an accessible way.
project_budgood_description: Created a professional website for a construction company that effectively showcases their services and portfolio, increasing their online presence and lead generation.
project_factum_description: Development of a high-load application, CRM system, and website for a company importing cars from US auctions, including auction data parsing and comprehensive history tracking.
project_skybud_title: Construction Company CRM with GPS Navigation
project_skybud_description: Created a CRM system with GPS navigation capabilities and website for a construction company, streamlining project management and resource allocation.
project_vimmi_description: Development of a SaaS project and website for a company specializing in increasing sales, featuring analytics, customer tracking, and performance reporting.
project_beautyprostir_description: Simple yet effective e-commerce website for trading niche cosmetics products, with a focus on product presentation and user experience.
project_llm_description: Creation of an LLM model with two types of AI for information search in documents of any format, enabling efficient knowledge retrieval and context-aware answers.
project_transport_crm_description: Development of a CRM system for a company engaged in automobile transportation, optimizing route planning, fleet management, and customer relationships.
project_smashandfun_description: Creation of a website for a company that specializes in renting rooms for breaking items with bats and hammers to reduce stress, featuring a comprehensive booking system.
project_soulspace_description: Comprehensive SEO setup and optimization for a wellness and personal development platform, significantly improving organic traffic and search engine rankings.
project_commentify_description: Development of a high-load application with artificial intelligence and CRM system that tracks competitors, your business, negative reviews, and helps improve customer experience with instant response capabilities.
project_everscale_description: Development of a web3 website for the well-known blockchain network Everscale (formerly TON Crystal), showcasing the network's features, ecosystem, and technical documentation.
project_cryptonumiz_description: Creation of a Web3 crypto token for the NFT project Cryptonumiz, including smart contract development, security auditing, and deployment on the Ethereum blockchain.
project_therace_description: Development of a decentralized application (dApp) and NFT racing game, featuring blockchain-based digital assets, racing mechanics, and an interactive user experience.
project_survey_bot_description: Created a sophisticated survey bot with integrated CRM and admin panel for conducting sociological studies, collecting and analyzing responses, and generating detailed reports.
project_crypto_signals_description: Developed a crypto signals bot using TradingView API, Binance API, Bybit API, Huobi API, and KuCoin API with an integrated algorithm for providing profitable buy and sell signals, enhanced with an LLM.
project_meta_management_description: Built a comprehensive management system for multiple Meta accounts (Instagram, Facebook) with AntiDetect Browser integration, enabling efficient management of multiple profiles while maintaining security.
project_product_parser_description: Created an automated parser for extracting product data, images, and prices from various websites, with CSV export functionality and integrated translation capabilities for international e-commerce operations.
project_social_parser_description: Developed an application for parsing data from all major social networks based on keywords and geographic locations, providing valuable insights for marketing, research, and business intelligence.
project_cefion_description: Cefion is a multifunctional messenger with chats, new conversations, and incredible features. App, scheduler, crypto wallet, and social network united in the explosive mixture for online communications in the modern world.
